title: Remove THCNumerics.cuh from THCAtomics.cuh
body_html:
Issue description

As per #10301, THCNumerics.cuh is to be deprecated going forward, however it is still referenced in THCAtomics.cuh here which may lead to runtime issues.

This issue is to track its removal to ensure deprecation of THCNumerics.cuh.

Code example

N/A

body:
## Issue description

As per #10301, `THCNumerics.cuh` is to be deprecated going forward, however it is still referenced in `THCAtomics.cuh` [here](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/THC/THCAtomics.cuh#L6) which may lead to runtime issues.

This issue is to track its removal to ensure deprecation of `THCNumerics.cuh`.

## Code example

N/A

## System Info

N/A

- PyTorch or Caffe2: PyTorch
- How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): source
- Build command you used (if compiling from source):
- OS:
- PyTorch version: master
- Python version:
